title: Linux builds fail if CPS project factory GUID is used in solution file
body:
Moved from https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/issues/297

Using a solution with the CPS project factory GUIDs ( {13B669BE-BB05-4DDF-9536-439F39A36129}  instead of  {FAE04EC0-301F-11D3-BF4B-00C04F79EFBC} ) causes x-plat builds to fail.

The new CPS guid for C#\VB are:
9A19103F-16F7-4668-BE54-9A1E7A4F7556 and 778DAE3C-4631-46EA-AA77-85C1314464D9. This is apart from the CPS one mentioned above which works for both projects. 

These should work in parallel with the existing ones.
